title: Comprehensive Inquiry into FBI's Surveillance and Investigation of Black Lives Matter Movement and Related Activist Groups

communications.communication:
Federal Bureau of Investigation
Records Management Division
170 Marcel Drive
Winchester, VA 22602-4843
Email: foipaquestions@fbi.gov

Re: New Freedom of Information Act Request

Dear FOIPA Request Service Center,

Subject: FBI Surveillance of Black Lives Matter and Related Groups

I am writing to submit a new request under the Freedom of Information Act (5 U.S.C. § 552), following my previous FOIA request (No. 1589047-000) and subsequent appeal (A-2023-01256).

Request for Records:
I request all records, reports, memoranda, emails, or other documents related to the FBI's surveillance or investigation of Black Lives Matter and associated groups or individuals involved in racial justice, police reform, or related activism. This includes communications between the FBI and other law enforcement or government entities regarding these matters.

Legal Citations:
In accordance with Department of Justice v. Tax Analysts, 492 U.S. 136, 142 (1989), and NLRB v. Robbins Tire & Rubber Co., 437 U.S. 214, 242 (1978), I expect a diligent search for records and a detailed justification for any withholdings under FOIA exemptions.

Interagency Search:
Pursuant to 5 U.S.C. § 552(a)(3)(C), I request an interagency search for records, considering the broad relevance of my query.

Fees and Costs:
Please notify me of any applicable fees in advance. The information requested is for public dissemination and not for commercial use.

Denial of Request:
If denied, in whole or in part, I expect a written explanation with specific FOIA exemptions, as required by National Archives and Records Administration v. Favish, 541 U.S. 157 (2004).

Enclosure Notice:
Fee_Waiver_Letter_copy_1.pdf

Publication Warning:
Be advised that the contents of your response, along with this request, will be made public. This information may also be used in court proceedings to ensure compliance with the FOIA.

Record of Correspondence:
This request and all responses will be part of the official record. Please assign a new FOIA request number for this submission, distinct from previous requests.

I look forward to your timely response within the statutory 20-day period.

Sincerely,

Jordan Lassiter
